content.query:
let materializedData =
materialize(
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| project Category, ResourceType, OperationName);
union
(
materializedData
    | where OperationName == "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
    | summarize Volume=count() by OperationName
    | project Category=OperationName, Volume
),
(
materializedData
    | where OperationName == "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
    | summarize Volume=count() by OperationName
    | project Category=OperationName, Volume
),
(
materializedData
    | where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
    | where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallIDSLog"
    | summarize Volume=count() by Category
)
| sort by Volume desc

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
	    iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
	    iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
	    iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
	    iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
	    "Other")))))
| where IndicatorType == "IP"
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by IndicatorType
| render areachart

content.query:
VMConnection
| extend NetworkSourceIP=RemoteIp
| where NetworkSourceIP <> ""
| extend FirewallManager=strcat("FirewallManager")
| join (ThreatIntelligenceIndicator) on NetworkSourceIP
| extend Indicator = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, FileHashValue, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName)
| extend Source=SourceSystem1
| summarize count () by ThreatType, Action, Indicator, Direction, _ResourceId, FirewallManager, RemoteCountry, RemoteIp, Source
| sort by count_ desc
| limit 250

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "DDoSMitigationReports"
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| extend TopAttackVector = tostring(parse_json(AttackVectors_s)[0]) 
| extend Total_packets_ = tostring(parse_json(TrafficOverview_s).Total_packets) 
| extend Total_packets_dropped_ = todouble(parse_json(TrafficOverview_s).Total_packets_dropped)
| extend TotalPackets =todouble(Total_packets_)
| where TotalPackets > 0
| where TopAttackVector <> ""
| project TopAttackVector, TotalPackets, TotalPacketsDropped = Total_packets_dropped_ , ResourceId , SourceIP=IPAddress, Resource, TimeGenerated
| sort by TotalPacketsDropped desc
| limit 100

# [DNSSEC for Agency Clients](https://www.cisa.gov/publication/tic-30-core-guidance-documents) DNSSEC protections ensure that domain name lookups from agency clients, whether for internal or external domains, are validated. ###¬†Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityBaselines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securitybaseline) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/security-center/)

üí°¬†[Support of DANE and DNSSEC in Office 365 Exchange Online](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/exchange-team-blog/support-of-dane-and-dnssec-in-office-365-exchange-online/ba-p/1275494)

content.query:
let FailedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "dns"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Failed"
| summarize FailedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
let PassedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "dns"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Passed"
| summarize PassedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "dns"
| summarize
    Failed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed"),
    Passed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Passed"),
    Total‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed" or AnalyzeResult == "Passed")
    by Description
| extend PassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed / todouble(Total)) * 100
| join kind=fullouter(FailedAssets) on Description
| join kind=fullouter(PassedAssets) on Description
| project Description, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, PassedAssets, FailedAssets
| sort by Total, Passed desc
| limit 250

content.query:
let data = SigninLogs
    | where AppDisplayName in ('*') or '*' in ('*')
    | where UserDisplayName in ('*') or '*' in ('*')
    | extend CAStatus = case(ConditionalAccessStatus == "success", "Successful",
        ConditionalAccessStatus == "failure", "Failed",                                     
        ConditionalAccessStatus == "notApplied", "Not applied",                                     
        isempty(ConditionalAccessStatus), "Not applied", 
        "Disabled")
    | mvexpand ConditionalAccessPolicies
    | extend CAGrantControlName = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies.enforcedGrantControls[0])
    | extend CAGrantControl = case(CAGrantControlName contains "MFA", "Require MFA", 
        CAGrantControlName contains "Terms of Use", "Require Terms of Use", 
        CAGrantControlName contains "Privacy", "Require Privacy Statement", 
        CAGrantControlName contains "endpoint", "Require endpoint Compliant", 
        CAGrantControlName contains "Azure AD Joined", "Require Hybird Azure AD Joined endpoint", 
        CAGrantControlName contains "Apps", "Require Approved Apps",
        "Other");
data
| summarize Count = dcount(Id) by CAStatus
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = dcount(Id) default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range(ago(14d), now(), 6h) by CAStatus
    )
    on CAStatus
| project-away CAStatus1, TimeGenerated
| order by Count desc
content.title: Conditional Access Status

| summarize‚ÄØFailed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(RecommendationState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy"),‚ÄØPassed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(RecommendationState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Healthy"),‚ÄØTotal‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(RecommendationState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy" or RecommendationState == "Healthy") by RecommendationName

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue startswith "Microsoft.Logic"
| where ActivityStatusValue == "Success" or ActivityStatusValue == "Succeeded"
| extend scope_ = tostring(Authorization_d.scope)
| parse-where scope_ with * 'workflows/' PlaybookName '/' *
| where PlaybookName contains "notify" or PlaybookName contains "email" or PlaybookName contains "teams" or PlaybookName contains "ticket" or PlaybookName contains "post"
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by PlaybookName
| render timechart

# [Shadow IT Detection](https://www.cisa.gov/publication/tic-30-core-guidance-documents) Shadow IT detection systems detect the presence of unauthorized software and systems in use by an agency. ### Recommended Logs üî∑ [SecurityIncident](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/securityincident) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Sentinel](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/azure-sentinel/)

###¬†Implementation¬† üí°¬†[Tutorial: Discover and Manage Shadow IT in Your Network](https://docs.microsoft.com/cloud-app-security/tutorial-shadow-it)
üí° [Review Your Security Recommendations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/security-center/security-center-recommendations)
üí° [Endpoint Discovery - Navigating Your Way Through Unmanaged Devices](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/microsoft-defender-for-endpoint/endpoint-discovery-navigating-your-way-through-unmanaged-devices/ba-p/2248909)
üí° [Device Discovery Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/security/defender-endpoint/device-discovery)

parameters.label: Status

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)))
| where Description contains "shadow" or Description contains "unauth" or Description contains "rogue"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| parse IncidentUrl with * '/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, TimeGenerated desc
| project ['Incident Name']=Title, IncidentNumber, Severity, IncidentUrl, FirstActivityTime, IncidentBlade
| limit 250
content.title: Security Incidents: Shadow IT

#¬†[Unified Communications & Collaboration](https://www.cisa.gov/trusted-internet-connections)
---
UCC measures including identity verification, encrypted communications, connection terminations, and data loss prevention.

# [UCC Identity Verification](https://www.cisa.gov/publication/tic-30-core-guidance-documents) Identity verification ensures that access to the virtual meeting is limited to appropriate individuals. Waiting room features, where the meeting host authorizes vetted individuals to join the meeting can also be utilized. ###¬†Recommended Logs üî∑ [SigninLogs](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/signinlogs) ‚ú≥Ô∏è [Microsoft Entra ID](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/active-directory/)
###¬†Implementation¬† üí°¬†[Security and Microsoft Teams](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftteams/teams-security-guide)
üí°¬†[Identity Models and Authentication for Microsoft Teams](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftteams/identify-models-authentication)
üí°¬†[Microsoft Sentinel and Microsoft Teams](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftteams/teams-sentinel-guide)
üí°¬†[Microsoft Teams Meeting Attendance Report](https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoftteams/teams-analytics-and-reports/meeting-attendance-report)
### Microsoft Portals üîÄ [Microsoft 365 Admin Center](https://admin.microsoft.com/)
üîÄ [Microsoft Entra ID](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/ActiveDirectoryMenuBlade/Overview)

content.query:
let LastObserved = SigninLogs
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by UserPrincipalName
| project UserPrincipalName, LastSignIn=TimeGenerated;
SigninLogs
| extend UserProfile = strcat("https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/UserDetailsMenuBlade/Profile/userId/", UserId)
| where AppDisplayName has_any ("teams", "webex", "slack", "zoom", "meet", "chat", "goto")
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize count() by UserPrincipalName, UserProfile, UserId, AppDisplayName
| join (LastObserved) on UserPrincipalName
| project UserPrincipalName, AppDisplayName, SignInCount=count_, UserProfile, LastSignIn, UserId
| sort by SignInCount desc
| limit 250
content.title: UCC Authentications

content.query:
let CustomView = SecurityRecommendation | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by RecommendationName| project RecommendationName, RecommendationLink | parse RecommendationLink with * '/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/RecommendationsBlade/assessmentKey/' assessmentKey '/' *;
SecurityRecommendation
| where RecommendationDisplayName has_any("http", "https", "TLS", "transfer", "transit", "Secure Socket", "SSH", "just", "FTP", "server-side")
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AssessedResourceId, RecommendationDisplayName
| summarize‚ÄØFailed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(RecommendationState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy"),‚ÄØPassed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(RecommendationState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Healthy"),‚ÄØTotal‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(RecommendationState‚ÄØ==‚ÄØ"Unhealthy" or RecommendationState == "Healthy") by RecommendationName
|‚ÄØextend‚ÄØPassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed/todouble(Total))*100
| join (CustomView) on RecommendationName
| project RecommendationName, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, RecommendationLink, assessmentKey
| where Total > 0
| sort by Total, Passed desc

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)))
| where Description contains "data" or Title contains "data" or Description contains "loss" or Title contains "loss" or Description contains "exfil" or Title contains "exfil" or Tactics contains "exfil"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| parse IncidentUrl with * '/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, TimeGenerated desc
| project ['Incident Name']=Title, IncidentNumber, Severity, IncidentUrl, FirstActivityTime, IncidentBlade
| limit 250
